title: China's Xi Jinping Urges G20 Leaders To Help "Cool" Ukraine Crisis
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping urged G20 leaders Monday to support efforts to de-escalate the war in Ukraine and reach a "political solution," state media reported.
summary: Chinese President Xi Jinping urged G20 leaders Monday to support efforts to de-escalate the war in Ukraine and reach a "political solution," state media reported.

title: Timeline: Key Events Leading Up To US Presidential Inauguration
content: President-elect Donald Trump will take office on January 20 after defeating Democratic candidate Kamala Harris.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump will take office on January 20 after defeating Democratic candidate Kamala Harris.

title: Kim Jong Un Meets Russia's Minister In Pyongyang As Ukraine War Deepens Ties
content: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un met Monday with Russia's natural resources minister in Pyongyang, state media reported, as visiting delegations from Moscow highlighted deepening ties amid the Ukraine war.
summary: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un met Monday with Russia's natural resources minister in Pyongyang, state media reported, as visiting delegations from Moscow highlighted deepening ties amid the Ukraine war.

title: PM Modi Meets UK's Keir Starmer at G20, Discusses Tech, Energy, Security
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met his UK counterpart Keir Starmer on the sidelines of the G20 Summit on Tuesday, during which he expressed eagerness to work closely in areas such as technology, green energy, security and innovation.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met his UK counterpart Keir Starmer on the sidelines of the G20 Summit on Tuesday, during which he expressed eagerness to work closely in areas such as technology, green energy, security and innovation.

title: Ukraine Marks 1,000 Days Of Russian Invasion, Eyes End To War Next Year
content: Ukraine marked 1,000 days on Tuesday since Russia's full-scale invasion, with weary troops battling on numerous fronts, Kyiv besieged by frequent drone and missile strikes, and officials preparing for Donald Trump to reclaim the White House.
summary: Ukraine marked 1,000 days on Tuesday since Russia's full-scale invasion, with weary troops battling on numerous fronts, Kyiv besieged by frequent drone and missile strikes, and officials preparing for Donald Trump to reclaim the White House.

title: Ukraine Calls Biden's Decision To Supply Long-Range Missiles "Game Changer"
content: US President Joe Biden's decision to allow Ukraine to strike Russian territory with American-supplied long-range missiles could be a "game changer" for Kyiv, the country's foreign minister, Andriy Sybiga, said Monday.
summary: US President Joe Biden's decision to allow Ukraine to strike Russian territory with American-supplied long-range missiles could be a "game changer" for Kyiv, the country's foreign minister, Andriy Sybiga, said Monday.

title: Russia-Ukraine War Marks 1,000th Day Today - The Destruction In Numbers
content: The war between Russia and Ukraine, the deadliest conflict Europe has seen since the World War II, marks its 1,000th day today.
summary: The war between Russia and Ukraine, the deadliest conflict Europe has seen since the World War II, marks its 1,000th day today.

title: PM Modi Discusses Space, AI With French President Macron At G20 Sidelines
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met French President Emmanuel Macron on the sidelines of the G20 Summit on Tuesday and discussed ways to keep working closely in sectors such as space, energy and AI.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met French President Emmanuel Macron on the sidelines of the G20 Summit on Tuesday and discussed ways to keep working closely in sectors such as space, energy and AI.

title: Lebanon, Hezbollah Agree To US Ceasefire Proposal With Israel, Says Official
content: Lebanon and Hezbollah have agreed to a US proposal for a ceasefire with Israel with some comments on the content, a top Lebanese official told Reuters on Monday, describing the effort as the most serious yet to end to the fighting.
summary: Lebanon and Hezbollah have agreed to a US proposal for a ceasefire with Israel with some comments on the content, a top Lebanese official told Reuters on Monday, describing the effort as the most serious yet to end to the fighting.

title: Biden Pledges "Historic" $4 Billion To World Bank Fund For Poor Nations
content: US President Joe Biden announced a "historic" $4 billion pledge for a World Bank fund that helps the world's poorest countries, the White House said Monday, before Donald Trump takes office with a new cost-cutting agenda.
summary: US President Joe Biden announced a "historic" $4 billion pledge for a World Bank fund that helps the world's poorest countries, the White House said Monday, before Donald Trump takes office with a new cost-cutting agenda.

title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman Joins San Francisco's Transition Government
content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has joined a growing list of former tech leaders taking roles in San Francisco's government following this month's election.
summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has joined a growing list of former tech leaders taking roles in San Francisco's government following this month's election.

title: PM Modi Meets Several Leaders On G20 Sidelines To Boost Ties
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met leaders of several countries, including those from Italy, Indonesia, Norway and Portugal, on the sidelines of the G20 Summit and discussed ways to improve and strengthen ties.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met leaders of several countries, including those from Italy, Indonesia, Norway and Portugal, on the sidelines of the G20 Summit and discussed ways to improve and strengthen ties.

title: Germany To Send 4,000 AI Drones To Ukraine, Rejects Long-Range Missiles
content: Germany on Monday said that it was delivering 4,000 AI-guided drones to Ukraine, as Chancellor Olaf Scholz stood by a decision not to send Kyiv long-range Taurus missiles.
summary: Germany on Monday said that it was delivering 4,000 AI-guided drones to Ukraine, as Chancellor Olaf Scholz stood by a decision not to send Kyiv long-range Taurus missiles.

title: India Highlights 4 Key Aspects Of Climate Action At COP29
content: India made a significant intervention on Monday during the '2024 Annual High-level Ministerial Roundtable on pre-2030 Ambition' at the COP29 UN Climate Change Summit in Baku, Azerbaijan, emphasising four critical aspects of global climate action.
summary: India made a significant intervention on Monday during the '2024 Annual High-level Ministerial Roundtable on pre-2030 Ambition' at the COP29 UN Climate Change Summit in Baku, Azerbaijan, emphasising four critical aspects of global climate action.

title: "Wanders Off...": Russian Media Mocks Biden For Avoiding Ukraine Question
content: US President Biden held a press conference in the Amazon rainforest in Brazil's Manaus but took no questions about America's decision to clear Ukraine to use its long-range missiles to strike inside Russia.
summary: US President Biden held a press conference in the Amazon rainforest in Brazil's Manaus but took no questions about America's decision to clear Ukraine to use its long-range missiles to strike inside Russia.

title: Delhi's Hazardous Air Quality Key Focus At COP29
content: Delhi's hazardous air quality was a key focus at COP29, as experts warned about the health risks of air pollution and called for immediate global action.
summary: Delhi's hazardous air quality was a key focus at COP29, as experts warned about the health risks of air pollution and called for immediate global action.

title: Ecuador Declares National Emergency Over Forest Fires, Water Shortage
content: Ecuador on Monday declared a national emergency due to water shortages, drought and forest fires that have razed more than 10,000 hectares in the south of the country so far this month.
summary: Ecuador on Monday declared a national emergency due to water shortages, drought and forest fires that have razed more than 10,000 hectares in the south of the country so far this month.

title: 10 Killed, 44 Injured In Russian Missile Attack, Says Ukraine
content: A Russian missile attack killed 10 people and wounded 44 in Ukraine's Black Sea port of Odesa on Monday, local governor Oleh Kiper and national police said.
summary: A Russian missile attack killed 10 people and wounded 44 in Ukraine's Black Sea port of Odesa on Monday, local governor Oleh Kiper and national police said.

title: Trump Confirms Military Plan For Mass Deportation Of Undocumented Migrants
content: President-elect Donald Trump confirmed Monday that he plans to declare a national emergency on border security and use the US military to carry out a mass deportation of undocumented migrants.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump confirmed Monday that he plans to declare a national emergency on border security and use the US military to carry out a mass deportation of undocumented migrants.

title: Global South Impacted By Food, Fuel Crisis Amid Conflicts: PM Modi At G20
content: The countries of the Global South are most adversely impacted by the food, fuel and fertilizer crisis caused by global conflicts, and G20 must focus on addressing the challenges, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on Monday.
summary: The countries of the Global South are most adversely impacted by the food, fuel and fertilizer crisis caused by global conflicts, and G20 must focus on addressing the challenges, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on Monday.
